attributes.title: Strange app side effects
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, I suddenly lost all awareness of other human beings and was overcome with a God complex.... so strange. I instantly gained 70lbs, my hands grew smaller and I began glowing orange. I couldn’t stop lying even when it made me sound really really stupid. Like white hot stupid. I wouldn’t risk this app, run fast!

attributes.title: Puras mamadas
attributes.review: Honestly as soon as I open the app I was not satisfied with my download I mean to at least waste some of my Wi-Fi not worth it I am I don’t know if I can even waste Wi-Fi but  I feel like I’m damaging my phone or something anyway I don’t like the app don’t download it it’s extremely stupid #Regrets

attributes.title: not only disgusting but just rude
attributes.review: i downloaded this to be a good american citizen 😁but the second i downloaded it trump himself ran into my home and pooped all over my furniture 😳he decided to stay for a while and while i was very angry what am i supposed to do? tell him to leave ? anyway he ran his hands all over my white walls🙄 by the time he left my whole house was orange😡😡 not even a nice orange🧡 a disgusting moldy cheese puff orange🤢🤢 don’t download this app or this will happen to you !! also you’ll have 200 years of bad luck🥴🥴🥴

attributes.title: 𝓷𝓸 𝓭𝓲𝓬𝓴 🍤
attributes.review:
i came here to see the commotion. unfortunately, i didn’t get my chocolate vanilla swirl with cookie crunch ice cream like i was promised!! AND THEN, i saw a photo of trumps peepeeweewee. WHERE IS IT THO? 🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤🍤 i’m so traumatized, HE WAS GETTING SPRAY TANNED IN THE PICTURE AS WELL!!!!! i’m so upset with this app.
Girl, 날 차분히 가라앉히는 멀미약

어딜가든 꼭 붙일 거야 널 내 귀밑에

처음 반하는 시간은 3초라지만

벌써 넌 이미 내 영원을 의미해

TV 스크린, 화장실의 거울, 태양도 모두 너야

왜이래.. 피하고 싶은데 피할 수가 없잖아

아니 사실 피하고 싶은 것도 아냐 실은 말야

슬픈 합리화쟁이 그게 지금의 나야

딴 생각 접고 잠깐만 나를 안아줘

비싼 여자란 타이틀 딱 오늘만 내려놔줘

Take it off now girl juss take it off

Take it off now girl juss take it off

Dim the lights down baby, dim the lights

We gon double your heart great form lady, juss dim the lights x2

attributes.title: Ruined my phone
attributes.review: Very bad app. This app takes funds from other apps on my phone and issues the funds in the golf app. Also made the rest of my phone very glitchy. Calls itself the best app and bully’s other apps. Would give 0 stars if possible.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought it would be useful but as soon as I opened the app it started discriminating against me not allowing me to use it because of the color of my skin and it was just very rude my over all experience was horrible

attributes.title: Worst App to exist
attributes.review: I’m sorry but when I open up an app I expect to be impressed not let down. When I first opened it, I gagged how is it remotely possible for a human being to look that disgusting. I mean I’ve downloaded some pretty bad apps in the past but this one takes the cake.

attributes.title: Read my Review so you understand
attributes.review:
I HATEEEDonald Trump the second I got on this app I saw thatDonald Trump called a girl a pig and he is also so racist bc he wants toBuild a wall if uSupport Donald Trump your a racist little b####
Y’all need to grow up and open your eyes if u can’t I recommend for u to go to the pig shop and get some glasses bc uObviously need help bless yall🤣😅😘

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This app was just a waste of space! If I could leave zero stars I would! Every time I would try to open it, it just glitched and took me back to the home screen. I’ve never had an app do that! Maybe it’s my phone rejecting a racist child predator’s app (understandably). I HATE THIS APP.
